User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://janio.com/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin and private areas
Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /api/

# Allow all resources and blog content
Allow: /resources/
Allow: /blog/
Allow: /case-studies/
Allow: /solutions/
Allow: /services/

# Block common crawlers from assets that don't need indexing
Disallow: /*.json$
Disallow: /assets/*.log$

# Crawl delay for respectful crawling
Crawl-delay: 1
